about_the_game:
FULL EFFECT is wicked piece of software that ended up being a side scroller with FPS mechanics.

The idea is simple: complete your mission and run'n'gun everyone who opposes you. But beware: your foes are well-armed, malevolent and greatly outnumber (but sometimes dumb)

You're the Ages: not a man, nor a machine, something in between and none of them at the same time (but mostly simple humanoid, i'm not gonna lie), the one who possess enough strength and endurance for this task. Tough, but your enemies will not tolerate a skill issue: They Fear You Less Than You Fear Them.

The game includes:
- Fast gameplay that focuses on firefights: it's more a shooter than a platformer
- A challenging campaign that require a tenacity and tactical approach to complete
- Simple but varied arsenal of various weapons and equipment that you find along your way
- Malevolent bosses and enemies who are eager to stop you dead
- Replayability: difficulty settings, modifiers, New Game+, achievements

This experience may turn out to be the best or the worst in your life, like it wasn't happened before but yet again.
